if (objectID == 75) { gamblechest(5000000); }
and

public void gamblechest(int moneyamount){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(!playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) { sM("You need "+moneyamount+" to gamble in this chest!"); } else if(playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) { int gamblechestpays = moneyamount*2;//makes you win the double of what you gamble int Luck = misc.random(100);//good luck :) if (Luck < 100000000) { //deleteItem(995, moneyamount); addItem(995, gamblechestpays); sM("You got lucky and won "+gamblechestpays+"!"); setAnimation(0x35E); actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else if(Luck > 100000000) { sM("Sorry you had bad luck! Better luck next time!"); deleteItem(995, moneyamount); setAnimation(1746); actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else if (Luck == 100000000) { sM("You Don't loose any money, but you didn't win try again."); actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }

item.title: TUT-Gamble system
item.dc:creator: @T-boy T-boy
item.description:
@T-boy wrote:

Please read befor you post so there are no missunderstandings…

Hi there, here is a simple Tut on how to add a gamble system. It was made in a delta sourse but you can make it work on any sourse/server.

okay first open up client.java
add this:

	public void gamblechest(int moneyamount){
		if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
			if(!playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) {
			sM("You need "+moneyamount+" to gamble in this chest!");
		} else if(playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) {
				int gamblechestpays = moneyamount*2;
				int Luck = misc.random(100);
		if (Luck < 50) {
			//deleteItem(995, moneyamount);
			addItem(995, gamblechestpays);
			sM("You got lucky and won "+gamblechestpays+"!");
			setAnimation(0x35E);
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); 
		} else if(Luck > 50) {			
			sM("Sorry you had bad luck! Better luck next time!");
			deleteItem(995, moneyamount);
			setAnimation(1746);
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
		                                                     } 
				}
		}

Okay now that we have added this pice of code let me explain to you what this does.
So what this is doing it’s just choosing any random number from 1-100, once that number has been choosen that’s when the rest of the code comes in, if the random number is less than 50 the person who click the object will win the double amount of money that they gamble. Now if the random number is greater than 50, again the person who click the object will loose, so he looses his money, but wait what about if the number lands on 50? well simple just add this at the bottem

else if (Luck == 50) {
			sM("You Don't loose any money, but you didn't win try again.");
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); 
						}

what you just added made it so if the random number landed on 50 you don’t loose any money and you don’t win nothing.

So it should look like this:

	public void gamblechest(int moneyamount){
		if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
			if(!playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) {
			sM("You need "+moneyamount+" to gamble in this chest!");
		} else if(playerHasItem(995, moneyamount)) {
int gamblechestpays = moneyamount*2;//makes you win the double of what you gamble
				int Luck = misc.random(100);//good luck :)
		if (Luck < 50) {
			//deleteItem(995, moneyamount);
			addItem(995, gamblechestpays);
			sM("You got lucky and won "+gamblechestpays+"!");
			setAnimation(0x35E);
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); 
		} else if(Luck > 50) {			
			sM("Sorry you had bad luck! Better luck next time!");
			deleteItem(995, moneyamount);
			setAnimation(1746);
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
		} else if (Luck == 50) {
			sM("You Don't loose any money, but you didn't win try again.");
			actionInterval = 4000;
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); 
						}
				}
		}

And you’re done.

But wait! like in every tut some idiot has to come and post something like this:
0mfg Howz d0 i’z m4k3 1t w0rkZZ W1th m3 S3Rv3r!???@??@@??@?@

Even though it’s simple but here is how you do it:
add this to were ever your clicking on a object is

if (objectID == ####) {//Replace the #### to the object id you want
gamblechest(###);// just add any amount of money you want....
}

ill add some pictures right now,

Have fun.

Here are some random pictures i took…

This is when you loose:

0001-1.png765×503

When you win:

0004.png765×503

and more pictures:

/this is old…
